text: ohuma ahasda, bhumiyada utpadanaya kala ayayi. oba venuven obagenma ohu jodu vasayenda (sæmiya ha birindada, elu, gava, otuvan væni) satunge joduda utpadanaya kara, (memagin) ehi (vividha pradesayanhi) obava visiri yamata salasvanneya. ohuta sama vana kisivak næta. ohu (siyallata) savan denneku ha avadhanayen yutuva balanneku vasayenda sitinneya
